word_mean: 曾称“同温层”。从对流层顶到约50km高度的大气层。层内温度通常随高度的增加而递增。底部温度随高度变化不大。
距地表约10～50 km处的大气层。位于对流层之上，逸散层之下。

sentence.Network_en: This was enough to launch their careers into the stratosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 这足以让他们的事业平步青云了。

sentence.Network_en: If oil supplies were ever disrupted, it would send U.S. oil-import bills into the stratosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 一旦石油供应被中断，美国的石油进口额就会大幅度增加。

sentence.Network_en: Most of the chlorofluoromethanes reside in the lower stratosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数氯氟甲烷存留在平流层下部.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 平流层（stratosphere）中部为逆温层，其下部为同温层。1．由于太阳短波辐射从地面反射到空气的加热是越接近地面越显著的，因 …
一些翻译~（转的~） ... southern hemisphere 南半球 stratosphere 同温层 subcontinent 次大陆.
生物学词汇英语翻译(Q-Z) ... stratose 成层的 stratosphere 平零 stratum 层.
高塔饭店(stratosphere)：登上全美最高,共109层约350米高的高塔饭店顶层,能俯瞰整个strip的全景及夜色.威尼斯人套房饭店(venetian)…

list.abs: stratospheric aerosol 同温层浮悬体stratospheric gas 同温层气体stratospheric halogen compound 同温层卤素化合物.
oceanic stratigraphy 海洋地层学oceanic stratosphere 大洋平流层oceanic surface-roughness 海面不平度
stratosphere 同温层，平流层stratospheric aerosol 同温层浮悬体stratospheric gas 同温层气体
平流层臭氧(Stratospheric ozone)(或称臭氧层,Ozone layer) 大氧中约有90%的臭氧存在于离地面15到50公里之间的区域,也就是平流层(Stratosphere)。而在平流层的.

entry.def: The stratosphere is the layer of the earth's atmosphere which lies between 10 and 50 kilometres above the earth.
If you say that someone or something climbs or is sent into the stratosphere, you mean that they reach a very high level.

example.ex: This was enough to launch their careers into the stratosphere...
example.tran: 这足以让他们的事业平步青云了。

example.ex: If oil supplies were ever disrupted, it would send U.S. oil-import bills into the stratosphere.
example.tran: 一旦石油供应被中断，美国的石油进口额就会大幅度增加。

means.word_mean: 1. the atmospheric layer between the troposphere and the mesosphere
